name: Moon Top: Short-Sleeve Organic Cotton Scoop-Neck Tee
description:
This photographic-looking full moon is printed on an Alternative Apparel short-sleeve, 100% organic cotton, scoop-neck tee... Famous for its flattering, feminine neckline and second-skin softness. Features a ribbed collar and blind stitching on sleeves and hem.

Women's contemporary fit.

Small: 32 - 34 bust | 26 - 28 waist | 36 - 38 hip
Medium: 34 - 36 bust | 28 - 30 waist | 38 - 40 hip
Large: 36 - 38 bust | 30 - 32 waist | 40 - 42 hip

The printing is done with super-soft and environmentally sound water-based inks.

Machine washable.

Wholesale inquiries welcome.

name: Red Panda Tote
description:
Lightweight cotton tote, printed by hand. Fold it up small and take it shopping, or use as your everyday carry-all.

Size: A3 (17 x 14.5")
Handle: Over the shoulder (18")

Screenprinted by hand, with non-toxic, water-based ink.

Wholesale inquiries welcome.
